mapper.select: SELECT p.id,pb.name FROM person p LEFT JOIN person_base pb on p.person_base_id = pb.id LIMIT 100

SELECT pb.name, pb.address, pb.telephone, pb.birthday, pb.identity, i.institution_name, i.id as institution_id FROM person p LEFT JOIN person_base pb ON p.person_base_id = pb.id LEFT JOIN institution i ON p.institution_id = i.id where p.id = #{id}
